str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.
A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; a separatist, i.e. Exclusively religious; a Pharisean, i.e. Jewish sectary.
Frequent, often, much. From the same as skenopoios; clasped, i.e. frequent; neuter plural frequently.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To fast, abstain from food. From nestis; to abstain from food.
Supplication, prayer, entreaty. From deomai; a petition.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 2nd Person Plural
str2: Yours, thy, thine. From su; thine.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.
